Level 3 Evocation Spell

Call forth a blast of lightning that hits all creatures in the line of the eruption.

On Save: Targets still take half damage.

Lightning Bolt is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Lightning Bolt is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Lightning Bolt Information

Description: Call forth a blast of lightning that hits all creatures in the line of the eruption. On save: Targets still take half damage. Level: Lvl 3 spell School: Evocation School Casting Time: Action Range: 30m (Line) Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: DEX Save

Lightning Bolt Tips & Notes

A target with the Wet status is Vulnerable to Cold/Lightning damage and will sustain double damage from this Spell. Lightning Bolt has almost twice the range of any other Spell.
